body_html: @elliothe one potential issue you will likely run into is that the existing SpatialDepthwiseConvolution in LuaTorch (the backing implementations are actually removed in this PR) is that the Lua layers have a differing format, see e.g. my thrown away PR here: torch/nn#1277. So you would have to handle some of these differences.
body_text: @elliothe one potential issue you will likely run into is that the existing SpatialDepthwiseConvolution in LuaTorch (the backing implementations are actually removed in this PR) is that the Lua layers have a differing format, see e.g. my thrown away PR here: torch/nn#1277. So you would have to handle some of these differences.
body: @elliothe one potential issue you will likely run into is that the existing `SpatialDepthwiseConvolution` in LuaTorch (the backing implementations are actually removed in this PR) is that the Lua layers have a differing format, see e.g. my thrown away PR here: https://github.com/torch/nn/pull/1277. So you would have to handle some of these differences.
